trans-unit.source: Provides access to the property values of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern" /> object using its <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Current" /> or <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Cached" /> accessors.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce accesso ai valori della proprietà dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern" /> utilizzando le funzioni di accesso <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Current" /> o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.TransformPattern.Cached" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il valore di un elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value is read-only; <see langword="false" /> if it can be modified.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il valore è di sola lettura; <see langword="false" /> se può essere modificato.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> set to `false` prior to the creation of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> object.
trans-unit.target: Un controllo deve essere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> impostato su `true` e il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.IsReadOnlyProperty> impostato su `false` prima della creazione di un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> che supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> pattern di controllo presenta un valore incrementato o decrementato la specifica del controllo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control-specific large-change value which is added to or subtracted from the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della modifica estesa specifico del controllo, aggiunto o sottratto dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRangeValueProvider.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The large-change value or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore della modifica estesa o <see langword="null" /> se l'elemento non supporta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> che supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> pattern di controllo presenta un valore incrementato o decrementato la specifica del controllo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.LargeChange%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di intervallo massimo supportato dall'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The maximum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore massimo supportato dal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o <see langword="null" /> se l'elemento non supporta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Maximum" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value set to the control-specific maximum value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> che supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> pattern di controllo è il valore impostato sul valore massimo di specifica del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum range value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di intervallo minimo supportato dall'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The minimum value supported by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore minimo supportato dal [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o <see langword="null" /> se l'elemento non supporta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Minimum" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value set to the control-specific minimum value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> che supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> pattern di controllo è il valore impostato sul valore minimo di specifica del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the small-change value, unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element, which is added to or subtracted from the elements <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della modifica di piccole dimensioni, univoco per l'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], aggiunto o sottratto dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" /> degli elementi.

trans-unit.source: The small-change value unique to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di modifica di piccole dimensioni univoco per il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o <see langword="null" /> se l'elemento non supporta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> that supports the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> control pattern has its value incremented or decremented by the control-specific <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> che supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> pattern di controllo presenta un valore incrementato o decrementato la specifica del controllo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.SmallChange%2A> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore corrente dell'elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The current value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element or <see langword="null" /> if the element does not support <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore corrente di [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elemento o <see langword="null" /> se l'elemento non supporta <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern.RangeValuePatternInformation.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 0,0.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> object obtained from a target control is passed into a function that retrieves the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> property values.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> oggetto ottenuto da un controllo di destinazione viene passato a una funzione che recupera l'oggetto corrente <xref:System.Windows.Automation.RangeValuePattern> i valori delle proprietà.
